newsitem.title: UK: RUGBY UNION-POPPLEWELL OUT OF SCOTLAND MATCH.
newsitem.headline: RUGBY UNION-POPPLEWELL OUT OF SCOTLAND MATCH.

text.p: Ireland prop Nick Popplewell has lost his battle to be fit for his country's Five Nations rugby union match against Scotland at Murrayfield on Saturday.
Popplewell, 31, strained a hamstring when playing for English league division two side Newcastle against Leicester in the Pilkington Cup at the weekend and was unable to train on Monday.
After an examination on Tuesday the Irish team management issued a statement saying he would not be playing and that a replacement would be named on Wednesday.
